01. About Me

Hey, I'm Anthony an aspiring Fullstack developer currently based in Toowoomba, QLD however I am moving to Brisbane by the end of March 2020.
So for the last few years I have been working in the Aged care sector and it is my main reason for this change, I wish to develop applications and web based services within the Health Care industry to provide support for nursing staff, patients and thier families.
